data.message:
## Session Learnings (2026-02-17)

### Design
- Design workout scoring: 0% match (most creative freedom) consistently scores highest because it avoids pixel-matching tension. 100% match plateaus at 82-90% due to micro-spacing/texture gaps needing production tools. Key growth area: blob depth in glassmorphism (~62% accuracy).

### Technical
- Decision Closure System: Always check existing tools before designing new ones. Initial spec proposed new validate_decision tool but duro_validate_decision already existed. Shipped: decision_validation artifact type + review_decision + review_next_decisions.
- Debug Gate pattern: Enforce 3 passes before storing root cause in incident RCA: (1) reproduction, (2) boundary identification, (3) causality + 48h observation. Prevents premature root cause claims.
- FTS embedding coverage: New artifact types (incident_rca, recent_change, checklist_template) were missing semantic text. Always add embedding text handlers when creating new artifact types.

### Bug Found
- duro_save_learning has a `name 'logging' is not defined` error. Needs fix next session.
